data.comment: [59] spectators have come along to watch today.
[59] spectators have come along to watch today.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
Union Berlin are caught offside.
B. Munich to take a throw-in in Union Berlin territory.
Union Berlin are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Robert Lewandowski (B. Munich) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Bastian Dankert.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Union Berlin at An der alten Forsterei.
Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to Union Berlin in their own half.
Union Berlin's Anthony Ujah misses with an attempt on goal.
B. Munich have a goal kick.
Throw-in for B. Munich in the half of Union Berlin.
Union Berlin awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Union Berlin drive forward but Anthony Ujah is judged offside.
Throw-in B. Munich.
Anthony Ujah for Union Berlin is whistled offside.
Free kick for Union Berlin in their own half.
At An der alten Forsterei, Union Berlin are penalized for being offside.
B. Munich awarded a free kick in their own half.
At An der alten Forsterei, Christopher Lenz has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Free kick for Union Berlin in their own half.
Free kick for B. Munich in the half of Union Berlin.
B. Munich's Serge Gnabry gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Union Berlin defender.
Can B. Munich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Union Berlin's half?
Bastian Dankert signals a B. Munich throw-in in Union Berlin's half.
Bastian Dankert awards Union Berlin a goal kick.
Corner awarded to B. Munich.
Thomas Muller for the away team is judged to be offside.
Throw-in for B. Munich in their own half.
Union Berlin are whistled for offside.
Free kick B. Munich.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Bastian Dankert signals a B. Munich throw-in in Union Berlin's half.
Can B. Munich capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Union Berlin's half?
Can B. Munich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Union Berlin's half?
Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to Union Berlin.
Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to B. Munich in their own half.
B. Munich will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Union Berlin.
Union Berlin have been awarded a corner by Bastian Dankert.
Throw-in for B. Munich in the half of Union Berlin.
Bastian Dankert awards the home team a throw-in.
B. Munich to take a throw-in in Union Berlin territory.
Bastian Dankert signals a Union Berlin throw-in in B. Munich's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Berlin.
Throw-in for B. Munich close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as Union Berlin is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Union Berlin awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to Union Berlin in their own half.
Throw-in for B. Munich at An der alten Forsterei.
Throw-in Union Berlin.
Free kick for Union Berlin in their own half.
Alphonso Davies for B. Munich has been booked by Bastian Dankert and receives a first yellow card.
Grischa Promel is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Bastian Dankert awards the away team a throw-in.
Grischa Promel is back on the pitch.
B. Munich have been given a penalty...
Goal! Robert Lewandowski gives B. Munich a 0-1 lead from the penalty spot.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to B. Munich.
In Berlin, B. Munich push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
B. Munich to take a throw-in in Union Berlin territory.
Thomas Muller (B. Munich) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Union Berlin awarded a free kick in their own half.
Union Berlin awarded a free kick in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Union Berlin have been awarded a corner by Bastian Dankert.
Important block from the B. Munich defence as Robert Andrich fires in a strike for Union Berlin.
Union Berlin's Grischa Promel gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a B. Munich goal kick.
B. Munich's Benjamin Pavard breaks free at An der alten Forsterei. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Bastian Dankert awards Union Berlin a goal kick.
The first-half is over.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Can Union Berlin get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in B. Munich's half?
B. Munich drive upfield and Serge Gnabry gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Union Berlin defender.
Throw-in for Union Berlin in their own half.
In Berlin B. Munich drive forward through Leon Goretzka. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to B. Munich.
B. Munich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Union Berlin is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Union Berlin in their own half.
In Berlin a free kick has been awarded the away team.
At An der alten Forsterei, Keven Schlotterbeck for the home team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
Throw-in for Union Berlin in the half of B. Munich.
Throw-in for Union Berlin at An der alten Forsterei.
Union Berlin awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to B. Munich.
Benjamin Pavard (B. Munich) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Berlin.
Throw-in for Union Berlin in the half of B. Munich.
Grischa Promel for Union Berlin gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a B. Munich goal kick.
Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to B. Munich.
In Berlin a free kick has been awarded the away team.
B. Munich have a dangerous throw-in.
Bastian Dankert signals a free kick to B. Munich in their own half.
B. Munich push forward at An der alten Forsterei and Serge Gnabry gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Union Berlin defence.
Throw-in high up the field for B. Munich in Berlin.
Throw-in Union Berlin.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Union Berlin have been awarded a corner by Bastian Dankert.
Ball safe as Union Berlin is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sebastian Andersson is on a sub for Anthony Ujah for Union Berlin.
Throw-in for B. Munich at An der alten Forsterei.
Hans-Dieter Flick is making the team's first substitution at An der alten Forsterei with Kingsley Coman replacing Leon Goretzka.
Christian Gentner is replacing Robert Andrich for the home team.
Union Berlin have a goal kick.
B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Bastian Dankert.
B. Munich push upfield but Bastian Dankert quickly pulls them for offside.
Bastian Dankert awards the away team a throw-in.
Bastian Dankert signals a B. Munich throw-in in Union Berlin's half.
Union Berlin to take a throw-in in B. Munich territory.
Goal kick for Union Berlin at An der alten Forsterei.
Can Union Berlin get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in B. Munich's half?
In Berlin Union Berlin attack through Christian Gentner. The finish is off target, however.
B. Munich have a goal kick.
Serge Gnabry of B. Munich smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to B. Munich.
B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Bastian Dankert.
Goal! Benjamin Pavard extends B. Munich lead to 0-2 with a header.
Joshua Kimmich with an assist there.
Joshua Mees is on a sub for Marcus Ingvartsen for Union Berlin.
Bastian Dankert signals a B. Munich throw-in in Union Berlin's half.
Goal kick for B. Munich at An der alten Forsterei.
Felix Kroos is replacing Grischa Promel for Union Berlin at An der alten Forsterei.
Union Berlin make their fourth substitution with Julian Ryerson replacing Marius Bulter.
The away team replace Serge Gnabry with Ivan Perisic.
Corner awarded to Union Berlin.
Bastian Dankert awards B. Munich a goal kick.
Free kick for B. Munich in the half of Union Berlin.
Bastian Dankert signals a throw-in for B. Munich, close to Union Berlin's area.
Throw-in for Union Berlin in their own half.
Throw-in for B. Munich at An der alten Forsterei.
B. Munich make their third substitution with Mickael Cuisance replacing Thomas Muller.
Felix Kroos gets his shot on target but fails to score for Union Berlin.
Free kick for B. Munich in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to B. Munich.
Union Berlin awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick B. Munich.
Ball goes out of play for a Union Berlin goal kick.
It's 0-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
